document.full_text: suppliers to apple inc have begun production of white iphones after a delay of almost 10 months, pointing to a launch date of within a month, two people familiar with the situation said on thursday.
document.title: apple suppliers begin making white iphones: sources
lines_and_colors: suppliers to apple inc have begun production of white iphones after a delay of almost 10 months, pointing to a launch date of within a month, two people familiar with the situation said on thursday.
